title: How to plan to reach your goal of self-improvement - Quora

response.answer_text: I find that most plans to achieve goals are so basic and may not work for everyone but i found new ways. Vision boards i know a lot of people are into that but i don’t add photos or scripts i only use a pen and paper and just start to draw as i visualize. I make sure everyday that i do at least 1% of my goal because it’s better to do 1% than nothing at all. I actually wrote a post of new ways to achieve goals , you can check it here NEW WAYS TO ACHIEVE YOUR GOALS - The Self Art

I have been on this journey for over two decades. I am not done. I spend time watching videos, reading blogs and engaging with people that I would like to feed off of and become in some way. I also try to have honest conversations with people to find my weaknesses in the hopes of growing. I have fixed many flaws and still have many more to go.
